text:
- So it's really exciting
to see the impacts

that we have on
businesses, on our clients.
And it's also really exciting to see
how much further we can go.
(inspirational music)

In Harbor Lab, we provide the
software as a service platform

for port agents to submit
disbursement accounts.
That's expenses that a vessel incurs
when it's visiting a port.
We were using technology

to digitize the process that
takes place within a port.
We've managed to make huge improvements
to the way operators do their work.
From six to seven vessels per operator
using our platform,

it's now close to 40,
50 vessels per operator.
And this number is still growing.

So our entire infrastructure
is currently on AWS.

Our services are deployed in
a Kubernetes cluster on EKS.

The support that we're
getting so far from AWS

and what we expect we will
continue getting from AWS
is that, through its managed services,

it makes technology
easy, let's say, for us

so that we can focus on
the hard business problems
that we're trying to solve.

We know that we have an
infrastructure in place

that's been tested by
hundreds other companies
in the world.
We know it's scalable.
We know it's robust.
We know it's secure.

We can sleep better tonight
because of all of that.
And we know that we have an infrastructure
that can continue to scale and grow
along with our company.
(inspirational music continues)
